info.name: /trblock
info.description: Deny an user or a role of join in your channel. If the member or any member with the role is already in the channel, he will be kicked.
examples: /trblock @sheiks - The role `sheiks` will be denined to join in your channel and all the members with this role that is already in the channel will be kicked.
/trblock 669975205325570048 @naju - The role of ID `669975205325570048` and the user `naju` will be blocked from your channel.
/trblock 919664522267070534 862740130385494027 286166598048284683 @naju - All these members will be blocked from your channel.

register.description: ðŸ§· Temporary Channels â€¢ Deny an user or role of join in your channel.

options.members: The users or roles that you want to block.
options.hide: If you want to hide the channel from the user.

membersBlocked: You blocked ${0} of from channel! To unblock them, use **/trunblock**.
